mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (no, member_id, product_no, product_amount) VALUES (seq_cart.nextval, #{memberId}, #{productNo}, #{productAmount})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE no = #{no} and member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.no, c.member_id, c.product_no, c.product_amount, p.name, p.price, p.product_image, c.product_amount*p.price AS total_price FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_no = p.no where c.member_id = #{id}
SELECT c.product_amount * p.price AS all_price FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_no = p.no WHERE c.no = #{no}
